title: Is it possible to play music from my phone through my home stereo? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe it is very possible, either you use a Bluetooth or a cable to interface your phone directly to your home stereo.. The cable can be plug to the same hole you use for your earphones..

Yes. You need an AptX streamer with RCA outputs (in other words, one with a built-in DAC). AudioEngine, Cambridge Audio, and other companies make them. Because these streamers use Bluetooth and Bluetooth doesn’t have great sound, you don’t need to spend your last dollar hoping for audio nirvana.
